#include <iostream>
#include <map>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	map<string,int> m1;
	map<int,string> m2;
	map<int,string> m3;
	int l;
	char name[51];
	cin>>l;
	int i;
	for(i=0;i<l;i++)
	{
		cin>>name;
		m2[i]=name;
		m1[name]++;
	}
	for(i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
	{
		m3[m1[m2[i]]--]=m2[i];
	}
	for(map<int,string>::const_iterator 
	it = m3.begin(); it != m3.end(); it++)
	{
		cout<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<endl;
	}
    
    //cout<<array.find("a")->second;
}
